FuncDef:
The output-alarm command configures multi-level alarm Boolean output.
The undo output-alarm command cancels the configuration of multi-level alarm Boolean output.
By default, multi-level alarm Boolean output is not configured.
CLIs: output-alarm slot <slot-id> index <index-id> level { eq | ge | gt | le | lt | ne } { critical | major | minor | warning }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of the alarm output port.
The value is 0 or 1.0: corresponds to OPEN1/CLOSE1/COM1 on the CMU panel1: corresponds to OPEN2/CLOSE2/COM2 on the CMU panel

Outputs alarms whose severity is equal to the specified severity.
-

Outputs alarms whose severity is greater than or equal to the specified severity.
-

Outputs alarms whose severity is greater than the specified severity.
-

Outputs alarms whose severity is less than or equal to the specified severity.
-

Outputs alarms whose severity is less than the specified severity.
-

Outputs alarms whose severity is not equal to the specified severity.
-

Sets the alarm severity to critical.
-

Sets the alarm severity to major.
-

Sets the alarm severity to minor.
-

Sets the alarm severity to warning.
-

Specifies the slot ID of the board that outputs alarms.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 characters.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-ops-assistant-outputAlarm] execute 1 command output-alarm slot 1 index 1 level eq major
[*HUAWEI-ops-assistant-outputAlarm] execute 1 command output-alarm slot 1 index 1 level eq major
[~HUAWEI] output-alarm slot 1 index 1 level eq major
[~HUAWEI] output-alarm slot 1 index 0 level eq major
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command must be used together with the OPS maintenance assistant.
This command is mainly used in the following two scenarios:
When alarms are generated or cleared on the Router, run the command to send the corresponding alarm Boolean status to the specified external alarm device through the ALM/ALMO port of main control board to an external device.Run the command to periodically send alarm signals on the Router to the specified external alarm device through the ALM/ALMO port of main control board to an external device.
If the OPS maintenance assistant is not used, directly running this command on the device only achieves one-time alarm output. Alarms cannot be continuously and periodically output.

Precautions
This command is only supported on NE40E-X8 devices.
